channel.title: Bitcoin on Preslav Rachev
channel.description: Recent content in Bitcoin on Preslav Rachev

item.description: Today, I woke up to this! As it turns out, hackers have stolen close to $40 Million from the Binance exchange. According to some, the sixth largest exchange hack in crypto history. More here: Hackers Stole $40 Million From Binance Cryptocurrency Exchange
